text: 3:14 Joel 2:28-29; Sekaraia 12:10; Aposel 2:33God Abraham deravɨra a gamigha ghaze, kɨ Abraham gamizɨ moghɨra, kɨ Krais Iesusɨn ingangarimɨn tuavimɨn Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba deravɨra me damuam. Egha God kamaghɨn ifonge, e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Krais Iesusɨn ikɨva, an Duam iniam. Egha kamaghɨn a uam e ini.
